# R Notebook

Some more technical audiences may require reporting which includes your methodology. This is where R Notebooks come in. R Notebooks are a subset of R Markdown documents that allow you to display and execute code directly in your document.

- Subset of R Markdown

```{r out.extra="style='background-color: #9ecff7; padding:10px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 40%;'"}
#| label: create-notebook
#| echo: false
#| out.width: 500
knitr::include_graphics("images/reporting/create-notebook.png", dpi = 270)
```

```{r out.extra="style='background-color: #9ecff7; padding:10px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 80%;'"}

#| echo: false
```
